item.title: pyarrow: pyarrow.lib.ArrowNotImplementedError: Filter argument must be boolean type
item.description: I wanted to filter a table in pyarrow table recently and ran into troubles when trying to use the filter syntax that I’m used to from DuckDB. In this blog post I’ll explain my mistake and how to fix it. First, let’s install pyarrow: pip install pyarrow And now we’re going to create a table that has a few countries and their corresponding continents: import pyarrow as pa countries = pa.
